OOC: This is quite long, but please read through all of it!

:::Deathsaurus/Leozak/Autojetter:::

::Deathsaurus was searching through the old records of the Deathcon, and he 
learned the story of the past Neocons(ready for a history lesson?).  It all 
started when Galvatron landed in a stasis pod and joined the Predacons.  he 
served loyally for awhile, but soon escaped from the base and built his own: 
the Deathcon.  he found many blank protoforms, so he created his own army: 
his treacherous brother and the original murderer of Sideswipe, Megastorm, 
and the Aerocons: Autojetter, Falcon, Snare, Jetstorm, and Cyclonus.  the 
Aerocons combined to form the gestalt Skyquake.  Soon after Galvatron 
suffered a humiliating defeat from a 5 year old child, Deathsaurus arrived 
and killed Megastorm, Galvatron, Cyclonus.  he built his 2 new warriors: 
Leozak and Hellbat.  Falcon and Snare deserted, and joined the Destrons, and 
Jetstorm joined the Chosen Mafia.  Leading up to now, with the Neocons being 
a small band of four.  But that isnt the WHOLE story.  Galvatron had a dark 
secret he had never unveild, NEMISES!  nemises was a giant monster ship that 
could destroy an entire faction.  Deathsaurus practiced long hours and 
believed could now control this Nemises.  He decided to use it immeadiatly::
Deathsaurus: Nemises, i summon you!
::The giant ship, which looked like a submarine with an eye, popped into 
transwarp space::
Deathsaurus: YES!!!!  Now destroy everything!
::The Nemises disobeyed Deathsaurus, for Galvatron, not him, was its master.  
It fired a death ray at the Deathcon::
Deathsaurus: NO!! I WILL NOT PERISH!  TILL ALL ARE ONE!
::Deathsaurus exploded, with nothing left of him.  Autojetter and Leozak 
immeadiatly realize that something is wrong  they look up to see Nemises 
firing at them::
Autojetter: AHHHHHH!!!!!
Leozak: what the f-
::He is cut off as the world seems to have been ripped in half.  He and 
Autojetter are dead before they hit the ground, but there bodies remain among 
the ruins of the once  proud base.  Eventually the sun came out, the storm 
stopped, and a new day began::

OOC: Now its up to Shomin weather Hellbat survives
